brrrrock.warning.message:
Brrrrock (Yeeterite) has had a major update
In this update the mod has been split into 2 different mods.
If you are using items included in the mod previously that aren't the pickaxe, ingot, block, upgrade template or bonder. You must add the Yeeterite Extras Mod to keep them.
If you are unsure, please make a backup of your world before loading it to not lose any times.
item.brrrrock.yeeterite_bonder.tooltip: §5Apply to a Piece of Yeeterite Equipment in an Anvil to make it Unbreakable§r
Speed at which to break Bedrock (1 for fastest)
text.config.brrrrock.option.UpgradeTempl: Changes the Drop rate for the Yeeterite Upgrade Template on Warden Kills (This translates to 1 in DropRate [Default: 1 in 5])
text.config.brrrrock.option.VoidProtecti: Prevents you from Mining the lowest piece of Bedrock in any dimension
text.config.brrrrock.title: Brrrrock (Yeeterite) Configuration
